info.title: Rat Genome Database
info.description: The RGD REST API provides programmatic access to information and annotation stored in the Rat Genome Database

get.summary: Returns a list ontology term accession IDs annotated to an rgd object
Returns annotation count for ontology accession ID

parameters.name: includeChildren
parameters.description: true: return annotations for the term and children, false: return annotations for the term only

get.summary: Returns a list of annotations for a reference
Returns a list of annotations by RGD ID
Returns a list of annotations by RGD ID and ontology prefix

parameters.name: ontologyPrefix
parameters.description: Ontology Prefix.  The prefix can be found left of the semicolon in an ontology term accession ID.  As an example, term accession PW:0000034 has the ontology prefix PW
